body: These bracers are decorated with icons representing air, earth, fire, or water, and depictions of genies appropriate to that element. The item protects the wearer against hot and cold environments as if she were using endure elements The vambraces' materials and other powers depend on their associated genie type.
name: Vambraces of the Genie
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Wrists/Wrists Slot Wondrous Items/Vambraces of the Genie

sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Wrists/Wrists Slot Wondrous Items/Vambraces of the Genie/Djinni

sections.body: These mithral bracers allow the wearer to use gaseous form, invisibility, and wind wall each once per day.

sections.name: Djinni

sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Wrists/Wrists Slot Wondrous Items/Vambraces of the Genie/Efreeti

sections.body: These scorched bronze bracers allow the wearer to use invisibility (self only), produce flame, and pyrotechnics each once per day.

sections.name: Efreeti

sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Wrists/Wrists Slot Wondrous Items/Vambraces of the Genie/Marid

sections.body: These coral bracers allow the wearer to use hydraulic torrent, invisibility, and water breathing each once per day.

sections.name: Marid

sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Wrists/Wrists Slot Wondrous Items/Vambraces of the Genie/Shaitan

sections.body: These adamantine bracers allow the wearer to use glitterdust, meld into stone, and stone shape each once per day.

sections.name: Shaitan
